deployment_modal.commit.title: Commit version
deployment_modal.commit.draft_is_readonl: Committed version cannot be edited anymore
Once you commit a draft, it becomes a fixed version for reference and cannot be directly edited. You can still create a new draft from it.
deployment_modal.commit.activate_to_go_i: Activating the committed version is required for production
After committing your changes, you need to activate the new version to make them live. Activation might require preparation.
deployment_modal.commit.validation_error: This draft can't be committed because it contains errors
deployment_modal.prepare.title: Prepare version
deployment_modal.prepare.activate_to_go_: Activating the prepared version is required for production
After completing the preparation, activate the version to make it live
deployment_modal.prepare.preparation_is_: This action might not be immediate
deployment_modal.prepare.validation_erro: The version cannot be activated due to validation errors. Create a draft from this version and fix the errors.
deployment_modal.prepare.preparation_ser: The preparation service is currently occupied. Please try again later.
deployment_modal.activate.title: Activate version
deployment_modal.activate.replace_curren: This version will replace the current live version.
deployment_modal.activate.live_version.t: The scenario will start operating and making decisions based on this version. The previous live version (if any) will be deactivated.
deployment_modal.activate.validation_err: The version cannot be activated due to validation errors. Create a draft from this version and fix the errors.
deployment_modal.activate.preparation_is: The version cannot be activated due to preparation errors. Please start the preparation process.
deployment_modal.activate.preparation_se: The preparation service is currently occupied. Please try again later.
deployment_modal.activate.is_draft_error: A draft cannot be activated. Please commit the draft first.
deployment_modal.activate.without_rule_s: this version contains no active rule snoozes
deployment_modal.activate.with_rule_snoo: this version contains active rule snoozes
deployment_modal_success.activate.title: Version activated
deployment_modal_success.activate.descri: The new version has been successfully activated and is now running on live data.
deployment_modal.deactivate.title: Deactivate version
deployment_modal.deactivate.stop_operati: The scenario will stop operating and no longer make any decision.
deployment_modal.deactivate.helper: You can roll back to a previous version directly from the version page
deployment_modal_success.deactivate.desc: The live version has been successfully deactivated, the scenario has ceased to operate

edit_timestamp_extract.explanation.day_o: Day number in the month, between 1 and 31.
Day number in the week, between 1 and 7, where Monday is 1.
edit_timestamp_extract.explanation.hour: Hour in the day, between 0 and 23.

edit_timestamp_extract.missing_default_t: No timezone has been configured for the organization. The timestamp will be interpreted as a date and time in the UTC timezone as a fallback.

No timezone has been configured for the organization. The timestamp will be interpreted as a date and time in the UTC timezone as a fallback. Go to the <SettingsLink>settings page</SettingsLink> to configure the timezone.
